snippet.title: [The Ssum:Forbidden Lab] Opening Movie English Version
snippet.description:
[The Ssum: Forbidden Lab] 
Released on 17th of August, 2022.
We invite you to a sweet daily life with a special ssum-one.

Google Play Store : https://bit.ly/3poKHTJ
Apple App Store : https://apple.co/3pld5WS

The Ssum (http://ssum.cheritz.com)
(C) 2022 Cheritz Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

Genre : real-time messenger game

[Voice Actor]
Seunghoon Seok (Teo)

[External Links]
Official Website : http://ssum.cheritz.com
Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/cheritz_dl
Naver Blog : http://blog.naver.com/cheritz
Tumblr : http://cheritzteam.tumblr.com

#TheSsum #MysticMessenger #OtomeGame
